RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 11000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: E R'S MIREYA vied for the lead, raced on the rail, saved ground through out, was heavily encouraged and closed while still racing along the rail and just missed for second. SHARE THE DOE vied for the lead, led from the two path, raced in between foes then stopped. SHORT STACK had an awkward start, moved over to the rail, raced off of the pace and maintained that position through out. LIL PARTY CRASHER raced from off of the pace in the five path, was asked and responded by advancing, was in contact with the the field by the quarter pole, was encouraged with a left handed crop but could not make any more progress. NICELY UNIFIED was off in the middle of the field, raced three wide, and in between horses, launched a bid at the quarter pole and improved, was kept on point, raced through rivals and closed well just missing the win but running a great second. JERSEY DOLL stalked the early pace setter from the three path, advanced and passed the front runner after the three eighths pole, was in the lead by the five sixteenth pole and began to draw off, raced on point through the stretch drive, was able to hold sway. SHESTHEBIGGAME stalked the leader from the five path then slowly faded. HIDDEN CHARGE was off slow, raced off of the pace and was never involved. LAST PENALTY was off mid pack, raced in the six path, mildly gained late. LONG SHOT LOUISE was off mid pack ion the four path, advanced and stalked, launched a bid at the quarter pole, struggled to switch leads but still closed well enough for third.

ENTRY.NAME: E R's Mireya
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, stalked, rai, saved ground, encouraged, just missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Share the Doe
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastien Ronald J and Sebastien Linda P

ENTRY.NAME: Short Stack
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, off slow, off pace, rail, maintained position

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Party Crasher
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5w, made contact with the field

ENTRY.NAME: Nicely Unified
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, bid 1/4, best stride late, closed, through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, advanced, controlled broke slowly, the 3/8, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Charge
ENTRY.OWNER: Simpson Bruce and Simpson Sarah H
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Long Shot Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, stalked, bid 1/4, struggled to switch leads, closed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 82. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf c ourse, it will be run on the main track at one mile and seventy yards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PREMIUM was off in mid pack, raced in the five path, launched a bid at the quarter pole, closed well and got up in time for the win. CRIMSON STORM was off in mid pack, raced on the rail, saved ground through out, closed. BELLO CREEDO vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, showed the way into the furlong ground then tired late. ZULTAN stalked the pace from the three path and maintained position. CREME DE BALI was off in the middle of the field, raced on the outside in the five path, advanced along the back side, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field, closed in the stretch but it was not enough today to win. DECLARE WAR was off a step slow, raced in the four and five paths, launched a bit at the quarter pole and gained mildly. UNCLE BRAD was off of the pace early, raced on the rail, was allowed to settle, made one run, bid at the half pole, gained ground in the turn, closed down the rail finding his best stride late. BIG ACE stalked the pace from the two path and in between horses then faded. MORO MAFIA stalked the pace four wide, then dropped back. OXXON was off a bit slow, raced off of the pace and made no impact today. CURLIN EDGES raced mid pack on the outside, then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Brad
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, saved ground, one run, gained ground turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, advanced, rail, saved ground, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Declare War
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, bid 1/4, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Premium
ENTRY.COMMENT: off mid pack, 5w, bid 1/4, closed up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Oxxon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Creme de Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, advanced, stalked, 5w, closed, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, set the pace, tired late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 10, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARCTIC ROSE ran in the three path with a steady gradual increase in pace. COOL INDIVIDUAL ran on the rail then had a late rally at the end of the turn from last place to over take most of the field. STEAL IT BACK went around the first turn three wide then settled into the three path coming around the second turn in the four path maintaining their current pace. PAYDAY TOO ran a steady pace with COOL INDIVIDUAL and STEAL IT BACK didn't have a final kick coming on to the stretch. SENATOR CON ran on the rail off pace throughout the race then shuffled back coming on to the stretch. DONNA'S COURT ran in the two path for most of the race, faded by the three eights pole in the middle of the turn, then slowed coming down the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 10, 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race o ver the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlongs).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAKE THE BAND MAN vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, went as un un challenged winner. THE GREEN MO'STER stalked the leader from the four path, bid at the quarter pole, closed down the lane and just missed in a photo for the win, still a game second. AFLEET ASCENT raced mid pack, stayed on the rail, shifted into the five path in the upper stretch, was encouraged and responded well closing in between rivals and getting up in time for third. TACTICAL PRIORITY raced from mid pack, raced on the rail, advanced into a stalking position, shifted into the four path after the five sixteenth pole, was encouraged and driven down the stretch, just missed for third. ANALYZER raced from off of the pace in the two path, gained ground, split foes in the furlong ground and out finished the rest. HURRICANE TIZWAY vied for the lead, stalked from the two path, saved ground but had no kick. CABOT raced from off of the pace, raced five wide, improved position then faded. KING OF THE COURT was off a step slow, raced off of the pace, and was no factor. MORRICONE raced off of the pace on the rail and showed little. TAPPIN FORA DANCE shuffled back early on, raced off of the pace and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jake the Band Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, pace, unchallenged, contested winner

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, stalked, rail, shifted 4 wide, upper, closed, just miss

ENTRY.NAME: Analyzer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2w, gained ground, split foes late out finished rest

ENTRY.NAME: Tappin Fora Dance
ENTRY.OWNER: Huff Ronnie Bone Danny and Booth Danny

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Ascent
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, 5 wide, upper, closed well, up in time for 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: King of the Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, 3w, no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOULDERING was off a step slow, raced from off of the pace, was given his head, shifted out into the six path as he happily gained ground, caught the field by the seven sixteenth pole, circled the field through the turn, took the lead, by the quarter pole, drew off in the stretch. SHADY GRADY vied for the lead, stalked from the two path, shifted into the three path at the sixteenth pole, closed. DOUBLE PRIORITY stalked the front runners from the four path, was asked to stay with the leaders, moved into the pocket just behind the pace, had to shift out into the six path in the turn, continued to gain ground, then had no late rally. RISKTAKER was racing from the middle of the pack, raced on the rail, advanced, had to check at the seven sixteenth pole, shifted out into the three path, then stopped in the stretch. FORGED IN STEEL raced from off of the pace in the six path, found his best stride late gaining mildly. JAMAICAN ME raced from off of the pace, trailed, and one run and closed well. PERFECT TOM stalked the pace from the four path then tired. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS vied for the lead, raced in the four path, helped set the fractions as he co led with another rival, then faltered after the quarter pole. OSCAR CHOICE vied for the lead, raced in the five path, co led with another rival and then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Bouldering
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, offpace, shifted out 6-7wl circled, led, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Grady
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 2w, stalked, shifted 3 wide, 1/16th pole, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Double Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, between, steadied, 8w upper, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Risktaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, advanced, checked 7-16th, shifted 3w, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed, made one run, closed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 27000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAJESTIQUE JOUR was off in the middle of the field, raced in the five path, was asked at the seven sixteenth pole, circled the field through the turn, took control at the three sixteenth pole, started to duck in but was quickly corrected, kept on point being hand ridden across the wire in front by many. TOMMIE G stalked the pace from the four path, advanced, shifted into the two path in the upper stretch and closed well. BUCKSKIN JERRY vied for the lead, raced on the rail, led and set the pace for the first two calls then tired. A MISS DEAMEANOR stalked the leader, raced on the rail and ran an even race. EVERLOVINGDEAL raced off of the [pace, stayed on the rail for the early part, shifted into the five path in the upper stretch but to no avail. OVERCAST vied for the lead, raced three wide, co led, stalked, then gave way. OUR INDIAN GIRL had an awkward start, was allowed to find her legs, raced in the four path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field through the turn, shifted into the two path in the upper stretch, encouraged, kept engaged. BELLAMYSAWESOMEDAY had an awkward start, raced mid pack on the rail, made no impact. BIG STAR BABY was off a bit slow, raced off of the pace and showed little. INEZ had an awkward start, raced on the rail, and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Everlovingdeal
ENTRY.OWNER: Tri-Star Racing LLC and Joey Foster Racing & Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, bid 3/8, shifted out 5w, to no avil

ENTRY.NAME: Our Indian Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Harden Patricia M and Hargrave Randall
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, settled, bid 3/8, circled turn, encouraged, engage

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamysawesomeday
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkwahrd start, mid pack, rail, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: A Miss Deameanor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, ran an even race

ENTRY.NAME: Buckskin Jerry
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Overcast
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 3w, stalked, co led, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Tommie G
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, advanced, shifted 2 wide, upper, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Majestique Jour
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 5w, bid 7-16th, circled, led 3-16th, hand ridden

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $35,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Clai ming Price $35,000. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlongs).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EVE'S DELIGHT ran in the three path then coming into the turn transitioned to the rail then proceeded to catch LAKE MARIE with approximately seventy yards left to secure the win. LAKE MARIE ran between the two path and the rail then got caught at the wire by EVE'S DELIGHT. HEATED ARGUMENT ran in the two path and with a constant increase in pace. TAKE CHARGE WOMAN ran in the three path maintained pace throughout the race. COUNTRY LADY ran in he two path with an even pace throughout the race. MICHELLES LIL STAR ran in the three path behind the pack didn't have a desire to rally. DROP DEAD SEXY ran in the three path dueled with LAKE MARIE at the start but two and a half furlongs into the race faded back and was passed by foes.

ENTRY.NAME: Country Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Respect the Valleys LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Michelles Lil Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
